description.narrative: The project aims to plant native trees in deforested areas, to protect natural freshwater springs through fences and reforestation and to strengthen food security of poor families by establishing vegetable gardens. The project is implemented in two departm ents: in Guaracura, municipalitites of Casanares and Trinidad and in El Cocuy. By the end of the project, trees have been planted on river banks and a number of wetlands and springs have been protected. The awareness and knowledge of the communities as to sustainable development and environment has increased, the communitarians know how to make organic fertilizers, more clean water is available through freshwater springs and food security of approximately 200 families has been improved. The nursery establis hed by the project provides tree plants for the region. The implementing agency is the Evangelical Lutheran Church of Colombia IELCO.
